name: Looi
tagline: Mobile and web design, interface, development
description:
The company was founded by designer ArturArsyonov in February 2013. The key staff of the company is based in Moscow.
 
Our main expertise is mobile applications and web services user interfaces, but our experience is not in any way limited by these particular fields.
 
Our company employees average age is 26 years old, average experience time in this industry is 8 years. 5 people are our basic key staff, and we put projects teams together from two more dozens of experts.
